author: The_Reviewer
title: Not Good at all
review: I got this set when I was eight. I used to like it, but now I hate this set. the printed windows  are okay. But the minifigures are a joke.  the vehicle looks looks stupid and is a piece of junk,the gas pumps are tiny and are the worst of their kind. this gas station does have some good pieces.if you are trying to make a lego fast food shop.finding this set cheap should not be too hard.but don't buy this set unless you find it for a dollar. -Thanks for reading.
